Vuoi davvero cambiare la Password ?: Do you really want to change the Password?
Inserisci la tua email qui sotto e ti in: Enter your email below and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
Segui questi semplici consigli per prote: Follow these simple tips to protect your personal information online.

ObjectivesDescription.Segui la guida introduttiva per capire l: Follow the introductory guide to understand the app's main features.
ObjectivesDescription.Espandi il tuo network invitando almeno: Expand your network by inviting at least three friends to join.
ObjectivesDescription.Condividi il tuo successo sui social med: Share your success on social media with your friends.
ObjectivesDescription.Carica la tua foto e aggiorna la tua bio: Upload your photo and update your bio to let people know you.
ObjectivesDescription.Guadagna punti completando le sfide e ra: Earn points by completing challenges and reach the first milestone.

PrivacyTipTitle.I tuoi dati restano sul tuo dispositivo: Your data stays on your device

PrivacyTipDescription.Questa app non raccoglie né condivide le: This app does not collect or share your personal information. Your meditation journey, preferences, and progress are securely stored only on your device.
PrivacyTipDescription.Non utilizziamo tracker di terze parti o: We do not use third-party trackers or analytics services. Your experience is completely private and is not monitored for advertising or data collection purposes.
PrivacyTipDescription.Per garantire la massima sicurezza dei t: To ensure the maximum security of your local data, we recommend protecting your phone with a PIN, password, or fingerprint.
PrivacyTipDescription.Se scegli di caricare un'immagine dalla: If you choose to upload an image from your gallery, the app will only access it for the selected purpose. You can control and revoke this permission at any time from your operating system's settings.
